query:
UPDATE customSuperprompts cs
LEFT JOIN organizations o ON cs.organizationId = o.id
SET cs.uniqueId = CONCAT(
  'CT-', 
  LPAD(cs.baseTemplateId, 3, '0'), 
  '-', 
  COALESCE(o.customerNumber, CONCAT('K2026-', LPAD(COALESCE(cs.organizationId, 0), 3, '0'))),
  '-V', 
  cs.version
),
cs.sourceTemplateUniqueId = CONCAT('OT-', LPAD(cs.baseTemplateId, 3, '0'), '-V1');
command:

LEFT JOIN organizations o ON cs.organizationId = o.id
SET cs.uniqueId = CONCAT(
  'CT-', 
  LPAD(cs.baseTemplateId, 3, '0'), 
  '-', 
  COALESCE(o.customerNumber, CONCAT('K2026-', LPAD(COALESCE(cs.organizationId, 0), 3, '0'))),
  '-V',

cs.sourceTemplateUniqueId = CONCAT('OT-', LPAD(cs.baseTemplateId, 3, '0'), '-V1');
